body: Hey guys, I just got a new razer mouse and keyboard, so I set the response time a little lower than I did before on my mouse, so I can hit much faster now. If any of you think I got hacks or something, please don't ban me :(, Its just my new mouse K?

title: New Razer Mouse

Which one? I have deathadder 2013

replies.body:
I think they make decent mice but you are buying the brand.
You can buy a Razer mousepad for $30. Bargain for when I could get a normal one for under a dollar.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Yea I think it's like when you by Beats or an apple product. Like the product is worth 30 and the brand adds on another 20-40. 

I ordered a redragon gaming mouse off amazon for 12 euro and judging from it's literally 99% positive 267 reviews it will do the job great rather than spending 60 euro on a mouse :P
